data.name: The Game of The Playful
data.detailed_description:
The game currently doesn't have an English version.


For players who have the official package in your STEAM library, you need to first uninstall then remove it from your library, then you can successfully download the demo.

If after auto update, you find bugs, please try uninstall and reinstall the game, thanks.

Because STEAM uses “file mapping rules” to partially update games, it will cause some errors to this game. Please uninstall and reinstall the game if you think the partial update creates bugs.

===

The Game of The Playful is a visual novel created by one person (characters are drew by outsourced artists). The engine used by this game is Visual Novel Maker.
In this visual novel, you'll play as the Heroine and experience twelve individual stories. In each story, you will establish either friendship or romantic relationships with a man. All twelve stories are independent from each other, so you'll be dating with only one person in one story.

The Game of The Playful is a visual novel created by one person (characters are drew by outsourced artists). The engine used by this game is Visual Novel Maker.
In this visual novel, you'll play as the Heroine and experience twelve individual stories. In each story, you will establish either friendship or romantic relationships with a man. All twelve stories are independent from each other, so you'll be dating with only one person in one story.
data.short_description: A single-player otome game with many characters; Players can customize characters' names(including male characters).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: We're very sorry, the English version is currently not available.
  • Additional Notes: please make the window at the front, otherwise the game load will be postponed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: please make the window at the front, otherwise the game load will be postponed

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains suggested themes. 
The game does not have nude pictures. Suggested themes are discribed in an implicit way.
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
